description:
Tetsuko, the swordsmith, asks Odd Jobs to look after her store, and Tama makes an oil-blooded friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Frappe tant que le fer et le Seigneur du Mal sont chauds / Pluie huileuse
Strike When the Sword and Overlord Are Hot / Oil Rain
Tetsu to Maou wa Atsui Uchi ni Ute / Oil no Ame
鉄と魔王は熱いうちに打て / オイルの雨
